local_intent: Approach dish, place grapes at plate center with yaw 0 and gentle press, release, verify release, and retreat.
assumptions: Grapes are currently in the gripper
Pose key plate_center is available on the blackboard
coherence_with_global: Implements the place phase: approach/align to plate, execute PlaceAt with yaw 0 and gentle force, open gripper, verify object released, then retreat to a safe distance.
